description: More detailed code concerning the type of the audit event - defined by DICOM with some additional FHIR, HL7, and other additions.
name: AuditEventSub-Type

text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://dicom.nema.org/resources/ontology/DCM, where the codes are contained in http://dicom.nema.org/medical/dicom/current/output/chtml/part16/sect_CID_401.html
  • Include all codes defined in http://dicom.nema.org/resources/ontology/DCM, where the codes are contained in http://dicom.nema.org/medical/dicom/current/output/chtml/part16/sect_CID_403.html
  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/restful-interaction
  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/bundle-type
  • Include all codes defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/iso-21089-lifecycle

title: Audit Event Sub-Type
